languages.text: {n}При вашем приближении Вигдис отрывается от настройки очередного вокса и склоняет голову:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, корабль поведал мне о нашей скорой встрече".

traits.locale_text: {n}При вашем приближении Вигдис отрывается от настройки очередного вокса и приветливо улыбается подвижной частью лица:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, корабль поведал мне о нашей скорой встрече".

languages.text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."
languages.original_text: {n}При вашем приближении Вигдис отрывается от настройки очередного вокса и склоняет голову:{/n} "Лорд-капитан, корабль поведал мне о нашей скорой встрече".

traits.locale_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the vessel informed me of our upcoming meeting."
{n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."
{n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."
{n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

languages.text: {n}Cuando te acercas, Vigdis deja a un lado el voco que estaba ajustando e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, la nave me había informado de que venía».
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te acercas, Vigdis deja a un lado el voco que estaba ajustando e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «L{mf|ord|ady} Capit{mf|án|ana}, la nave me había informado de que venía».

languages.text: {n}当你走近时，维格迪斯放下了正在进行微调的音阵系统，朝你低下了头。{/n}“舰长大人，飞船通知我说很快就会与您见面。”
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}当你走近时，维格迪斯放下了正在进行微调的音阵系统，朝你低下了头。{/n}“舰长大人，飞船通知我说很快就会与您见面。”

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスに近づけば、よく調整されたヴォクスから離れて、こちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船からあなたとすぐに会うようにとの連絡がきました」
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスに近づけば、よく調整されたヴォクスから離れて、こちらに頭を下げた。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、船からあなたとすぐに会うようにとの連絡がきました」

languages.text: {n}Als du dich näherst, unterbricht Vigdis die Feinjustierung eines weiteren Vox und senkt den Kopf:{/n} "Lord Captain, das Schiff hat mich über unser bevorstehendes Treffen informiert."
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich näherst, unterbricht Vigdis die Feinjustierung eines weiteren Vox und senkt den Kopf:{/n} "Lord Captain, das Schiff hat mich über unser bevorstehendes Treffen informiert."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, qui était en train de régler un autre vox, cesse son travail et incline la tête en vous voyant approcher.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, le vaisseau m'a informée de notre rencontre imminente. »
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, qui était en train de régler un autre vox, cesse son travail et incline la tête en vous voyant approcher.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, le vaisseau m'a informée de notre rencontre imminente. »

languages.text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Vigdis, vokslara ince ayar yapma işini yarıda bırakıp başını eğiyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gemi bana görüşeceğimiz bilgisini vermişti."
languages.original_text: {n}When you approach, Vigdis pulls away from fine-tuning another vox and bows her head:{/n} "Lord Captain, the ship informed me of our imminent meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Vigdis bir başka voksa ince ayar yapma işini yarıda bırakıyor ve başını eğiyor:{/n} "Lord Kaptan, gemi bana görüşeceğimiz bilgisini vermişti."
